title: Acerâ€™s new ConceptD creator laptops have OLED displays
content:
Today, Acer is holding its annual next@acer event, where it introduced new products from its entire portfolio. That includes ConceptD, its lineup for creators. Specifically, the firm announced a new ConceptD 5, ConceptD 5 Pro, ConceptD 500, and ConceptD 100. Acer ConceptD 5 and ConceptD 5 Pro Perhaps unsurprisingly in today’s market, the ConceptD 5

The post Acer’s new ConceptD creator laptops have OLED displays appeared first on XDA.
description: Acer is refreshing its line of ConceptD creator PCs, and as you can probably guess, they're getting more powerful with new designs.
